Name: Axle_Length
Comments: REFERENCE - DO NOT MODIFY!  8mm Steel Axle Length

Name: Spool_Width_Max
Comments: Maximum Width of Spool to be Used - Adjust to your desired max and maybe add a couple millimeters.

Name: Spool_Width_Min
Comments: Min. Width of Spool to be Used (34mm is min to have clearance for Tensioner Arms). A larger number will save material if you don't use narrow spools (i.e. 0.25kg).

Name: Min_Spool_Rim_Thickness
Comments: Adjust for the thickest rim of the narrowest spool.  Only important if you are trying to squeeze narrow spools onto the rewinder.

Name: Axle_Under_Over_Hang
Comments: Adjust degree of axle protrusion (positive) or inset (negative, must be >=-5.5) from the rewinder footprint for a standard axle length (if needed).

Name: Base_Plate
Comments: REFERENCE - DO NOT MODIFY! Total rewinder width.

Name: Roller_Face_Width
Comments: REFERENCE! - DO NOT MODIFY! Stretched rubber band(s) total required width.
